about_the_game:
Platformers Book

This Platformers themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! The book celebrates the Game Genre of Platformers, visit many game worlds in this brand new addition to Coloring Pixels!

Voted on by our community, take a hop, skip and a jump through this new book!

Contents

The Platformers book unlocks the following images:

  • Life Bar - 64x32
  • Walking - 75x28
  • Box Breaking - 75x29
  • Apple Collector - 100x66
  • Cave - 100x70
  • Spelunking - 100x140
  • Ruins Explorer - 115x125
  • Enemies - 135x84
  • Controls - 145x82
  • Cold Zone - 150x70
  • Dystopian - 150x130
  • Abstract - 160x100
  • Dungeon - 200x200
  • Pirate Isle - 223x159
  • King Quest - 243x337
  • Medieval - 245x231
  • Boss Fight - 250x120
  • Deep Sea - 280x100
  • Village Run - 300x140
  • Knight Quest - 315x175

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
